Package com.coldline.src.game

package com.coldline.src.game
  • Class
    Description
    BadEnding
    sets menu UI state when the bad ending is met
    Game
    main UI for the base game which implements FrameGetter and FrameInitializer
    GameDataInitializer
    game data interface initializer
    GameDetailsInitializer
    initializes game details
    GameFileNameInitializer
    initializes game files
    GoodEnding
    sets the UI once the good ending is met
    Home
    class during the start of the game uses the classes which constitute the UI
    MessageFrame
    creates the MessageFrame class which implements from a few interfaces sets the UI characteristics
    PlayAudio
    plays the audio in the background
    StaticData
    houses all the static data the package needs such as the game data between states, asset file names,and provides methods for getting the audio file for each state
    StaticData.GameData
    game data class which measures each state of the game
    StaticData.GameDetails
    ui window
    StaticData.GameFileNames
    class which has the file names as constant strings used in Dialogue class
